argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ordsucim | |- ( Ord A -> Ord suc A ) |
| 2 |  | #P_sucidg | |- ( A e. _V -> A e. suc A ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ordelord | |- ( ( Ord suc A /\ A e. suc A ) -> Ord A ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_ex | |- ( Ord suc A -> ( A e. suc A -> Ord A ) ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_syl5com | |- ( A e. _V -> ( Ord suc A -> Ord A ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_impbid2 | |- ( A e. _V -> ( Ord A <-> Ord suc A ) ) |
